result.markdown:
---
title: "chol data"
author: "Nicky Wakim"
format: 
  html:
    link-external-newwindow: true
    toc: true
    toc_float:
      collapsed: false
    number-sections: true
    number-depth: 3
    theme: lumen
    self-contained: true
    html-math-method: mathjax
    highlight-style: tango
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---


- Load my packages

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```
:::


- Import the data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chol = read.csv(here("Data", "chol213_n40.csv"))
```
:::


- Take the difference in cholesterol levels then look at the data

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chol2 = chol %>% mutate(diff = After - Before)
glimpse(chol2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 43
Columns: 3
$ Before <int> 195, 145, 205, 159, 244, 166, 250, 236, 192, 224, 238, 197, 169…
$ After  <int> 146, 155, 178, 146, 208, 147, 202, 215, 184, 208, 206, 169, 182…
$ diff   <int> -49, 10, -27, -13, -36, -19, -48, -21, -8, -16, -32, -28, 13, -…
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
head(chol2, 10)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
   Before After diff
1     195   146  -49
2     145   155   10
3     205   178  -27
4     159   146  -13
5     244   208  -36
6     166   147  -19
7     250   202  -48
8     236   215  -21
9     192   184   -8
10    224   208  -16
```
:::
:::


- Pivot my dataset from wide to long

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chol3 = chol2 %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c("Before", "After", "diff"), 
    names_to = "Timepoint", 
    values_to = "Cholesterol"
  )

head(chol3, 15)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 15 × 2
   Timepoint Cholesterol
   <chr>           <int>
 1 Before            195
 2 After             146
 3 diff              -49
 4 Before            145
 5 After             155
 6 diff               10
 7 Before            205
 8 After             178
 9 diff              -27
10 Before            159
11 After             146
12 diff              -13
13 Before            244
14 After             208
15 diff              -36
```
:::
:::
